alert.note: Alert for Becker; Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 4:42PM CDT until June 24 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Wadena County in central Minnesota... Northeastern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Southeastern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 442 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New York Mills, or 29 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New York Mills, Wolf Lake, Hillview, Butler, Midway, Ottertail and Perham. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central, northwestern and west central Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central, northwestern and west central Minnesota.
